source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Learn How to Make A Blueberry Branch: Step by Step Tutorial
items.headline: How to make realistic gum paste and modelling paste blueberry fruits for cake decorators and artists.
objectives_summary: How to make blueberries from sugar paste
How to make leaves from sugar paste
How to colour dust the blueberries and leaves

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Blooming near waterfall - Landscape

visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: Step by Step real-time Painting Tutorial! You will paint Blooming near waterfall with this lesson!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint landscape: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, dry brush, shaped brushes using
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Procreate tutorial, a realistic bird (digital ipad drawing)
items.headline: creating realistic feathers in procreate, let's make this cockatoo!
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn to draw a realistic cockatoo in the app Procreate, an app on the Ipad. So it's a digital drawing!

items.title: Kintsugi　Course3　 How to repair small chips
items.headline: Learn full-scale Kintsugi work
objectives_summary: Experience traditional Kintsugi work　伝統的な金継ぎの作業を体験できる
Those who Get an opportunity to experience Japanese culture　日本文化に触れる機会が得られる
Learn safe repair of broken or chipped vessels　壊れたり欠けたりした器の安全な修復が学べる

items.title: Ignite your Creativity with Polymer Clay
items.headline: Learn to create your unique swirl patterned beads
objectives_summary: Introduction to polymer clay by creating swirl beads

items.title: Paint Tulips Like a Pro: Botanical Watercolor Series Part II
items.headline: Learn how to use advanced watercolor techniques to paint this intermediate level bouquet of tulips.
objectives_summary: How to create soft background for a botanical scene using wet on wet technique
How to find your best color combinations from your palette
How to create realistic tulips all united in one composition

items.title: How to make jewelry with wire & Become a jewelry designer
items.headline: This course is a complete guideline to become jewelry designer and how to make own jewelry
objectives_summary: How to Make Jewelry with Wire
Selecting Your Materials
Creating Basic Wire Links

items.title: Watercolor Portrait Painting: Faces and Portraits
items.headline: Learn How to paint loose and vibrant watercolor portraits
objectives_summary: Using my two step process in painting a watercolor portrait - keeping colors fresh and vibrant.
Using essential watercolour techniques such as wet-in-wet and wet-on-dry in portraiture.
How to determine a light source, and the correct use of values in painting.

items.title: How to Draw Farm Animals Vol 2 - Cow, Goat and Lambs
items.headline: Learn How to Draw 3 more AMAZING Farm Animals with EASY to follow step by step videos. Draw Pictures you can be proud of
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw 3 Different Farm Animals
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: 3 Techniques to Combine Watercolor and Gouache in your art
items.headline: Join me and learn how to combine watercolour and gouache to illustrate an opulent bohemian bungalow!
objectives_summary: The similarities and differences between watercolour and gouache
Layering paints to create pattern and texture
How to mix brand new opaque colours using watercolours

items.title: Watercolor Painting Essentials - Line and Wash Sketching
items.headline: English
objectives_summary: Materials - what paints, paper, brushes and pens you will need.
A crucial series of 6 lessons on understanding 'values' and color - including practical exercises and demonstrations for you to follow along to.
Understanding light sources and how to paint realistic shadows.

items.title: Learn Flower Acrylic Painting - Let's Paint With Acrylics

visible_instructors.title: Rhythm Ghai
visible_instructors.name: Rhythm
visible_instructors.job_title: Instructor - Drawing, Painting, Sketching, Portrait, Mandala

items.headline: Easy & Guided 4 Art Projects - Learn to Draw & Paint 4 different types of flower paintings with guided tutorial videos
objectives_summary: Learn Acrylic Painting with Step By Step Guided Videos
Create 4 masterpieces of Flowers with Acrylic Painting
Learn new techniques of painting with acrylic paints

items.title: How To Paint a Realistic Horse Head in Watercolor Paint Fur!
items.headline: Learn how to paint fine relealistic fur, an amazing eye, work with layers, wet in wet washes, muscle structure and more!
objectives_summary: Learn to paint this very detailed horse had study in watercolour, while I guide you step by step through a range of techniques.
Learn how to work with the fine hairs of a horse by layering and considering shapes, length of the lines and much more.
Paint realistic eyes. The eyes of a horse do have a lot of depth, so  I will show yo how to achive life within them.

items.title: A Beginners Guide To Collage Painting - Triple Cello Design

visible_instructors.title: Froyle Davies
visible_instructors.name: Froyle
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist with over 25 years of experience

items.headline: Learn how to create a collage painting like a professional, even if this is your first time.
objectives_summary: You will learn to create your own collage paper using acrylic inks and watercolour paint.
How to use your own images for inspiration.
Using book text and musical pages for collage papers.

items.title: Springtime in Soft Pastel
items.headline: Sketching and drawing spring flowers with Soft Pastels
objectives_summary: Drawing with Soft Pastel
How to use various Soft Pastel supplies
Creating backgrounds

items.title: Beach Resin Art for Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to create beautiful beach art pieces
objectives_summary: How to safely use resin
How to properly mix your Resin
How to get rid of bubbles
